original_text: Which was the son of Mathusala, which was the son of Enoch, which was the son of Jared, which was the son of Maleleel, which was the son of Cainan,
korean_text: 그 위는 므두셀라요 그 위는 에녹이요 그 위는 야렛이요 그 위는 마할랄렐이요 그 위는 가이난이요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Mathusala
which was the son of Enoch
which was the son of Jared
which was the son of Maleleel
which was the son of Cainan
